name: Medianova CDN
author: Medianova CDN

sections.description:
A CDN is a server network system that enables your users to access your website faster and reach your site by serving them from the servers located near them.

What it Does ?

Medianova CDN plugin is created to easily modify the links of your static content (css, js, images) with cdn url.

Features

  • Changes the paths of your files to CDN url
  • You can declare the included folders.
  • You can declare invalid folders and file extension.

Manuel Installation

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin as medianova-cdn.zip file and extract to your pc.
  2. Upload medianova-cdn folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

2.2

Plugin tested for version 6.1.1
Plugin tested for version 6.1
Plugin tested for version 6.0.3
Plugin tested for version 6.0
Plugin tested for version 5.9.5
Plugin tested for version 5.9
Plugin tested for version 5.8.6
Plugin tested for version 5.8
Plugin tested for version 5.7

2.1

Plugin tested for version 5.4

2.0

Plugin has compatible with new versions of wordpress

1.0

Plugin went live

short_description: A Content Delivery Network (CDN) is a geographically distrubuted group of servers which run together handing over static contents.
